verses.text: \w Now|strong="H8085"\w* Phassur \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Emmur, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* appointed \w chief|strong="H5057"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* Jeremias \w prophesying|strong="H5012"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Phassur \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* Jeremias \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w stocks|strong="H4115"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w upper|strong="H5945"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* light \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w next|strong="H4283"\w* \w day|strong="H4283"\w*, Phassur \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* Jeremias \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w stocks|strong="H4115"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* Jeremias \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* Phassur, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* fear \w on|strong="H0413"\w* every side.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w up|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* fear, thee \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w friends|strong="H0157"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* Juda \w into|strong="H1540"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w strike|strong="H5221"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* substance \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* labour, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w precious|strong="H3366"\w* \w thing|strong="H2063"\w* thereof, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H0935"\w* \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* \w pillage|strong="H0962"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w carry|strong="H3947"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0859"\w* thou, Phassur, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* thou shalt \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* thou shalt \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* thou shalt \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w*, thou \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w friends|strong="H0157"\w*, \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w lie|strong="H8267"\w*.

Thou hast deceived \w me|strong="H2388"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* deceived: thou hast \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w stronger|strong="H2388"\w* \w than|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou hast \w prevailed|strong="H3201"\w*. \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* laughing-stock \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w scoff|strong="H3932"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H2388"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w now|strong="H1961"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w*, \w crying|strong="H2199"\w* \w out|strong="H2199"\w* \w against|strong="H1696"\w* iniquity, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w often|strong="H1767"\w* \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* \w devastation|strong="H7701"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w derision|strong="H7047"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H3201"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H3201"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H2142"\w* \w mention|strong="H2142"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w him|strong="H0559"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w any|strong="H5750"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w burning|strong="H0784"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w shut|strong="H6113"\w* \w up|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w I|strong="H3201"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w wearied|strong="H3811"\w*, \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w being|strong="H1961"\w* \w able|strong="H3201"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* bear \w it|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* reproaches \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w terror|strong="H4032"\w* \w on|strong="H3605"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w side|strong="H5439"\w*: Persecute \w him|strong="H5046"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w let|strong="H5046"\w* \w us|strong="H5046"\w* persecute \w him|strong="H5046"\w*: \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H5439"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* familiars, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* continued \w at|strong="H3201"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w side|strong="H5439"\w*: \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w by|strong="H3605"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* means \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H7965"\w* \w be|strong="H0582"\w* deceived, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H7965"\w* \w prevail|strong="H3201"\w* \w against|strong="H4480"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w be|strong="H0582"\w* revenged \w on|strong="H3605"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w strong|strong="H1368"\w* \w warrior|strong="H1368"\w*: \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w persecute|strong="H7291"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w fall|strong="H3782"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w weak|strong="H3808"\w*: \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* \w confounded|strong="H0954"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w understood|strong="H7919"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w reproach|strong="H3639"\w*, which \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* effaced.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* thou, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, prover \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* seest \w the|strong="H0853"\w* reins \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*: \w let|strong="H1540"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* beseech thee, thy \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w laid|strong="H1540"\w* \w open|strong="H1540"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w cause|strong="H7379"\w*.

\w Sing|strong="H7891"\w* ye \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w poor|strong="H0034"\w* \w out|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7489"\w*.

\w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w wherein|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w borne|strong="H3205"\w*: \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w me|strong="H3205"\w*, \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w*.

\w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w brought|strong="H3205"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tidings|strong="H1319"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w my|strong="H0834"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w A|strong="H3205"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w child|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thee: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w made|strong="H8055"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* greatly \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w overthrown|strong="H2015"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w repented|strong="H5162"\w*: \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H1931"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w cry|strong="H2201"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* howling \w at|strong="H3068"\w* noontide:

\w Who|strong="H0834"\w* slew \w me|strong="H4191"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w womb|strong="H7358"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w might|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w grave|strong="H6913"\w*, \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w her|strong="H1961"\w* \w womb|strong="H7358"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* conception.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w womb|strong="H7358"\w*, \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* labour \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w sorrow|strong="H3015"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w spent|strong="H3615"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* confusion?
